name: Standard
tooltip:
Applies an offset to all three dimensions of the parts boundaries.

The filter allows only integer numbers.

Most useful for standard milling parts.

name: Exact
tooltip:
Applies no offset, just retrieves the exact measurements of the parts boundaries.

Most useful for sheet metal parts.

name: Cut
tooltip:
Applies no offset, just retrieves the exact measurements of the parts boundaries.

The axis represents the length of the cut element. The axis will be auto-detected. If no axis can be detected the longest dimension will be used as cutting-dimension.

When a thickness parameter is available it will be added to the result.

Most useful for sections or strut profiles.
filter_examples: 40 x 40 x 5 x 800 (where 5 is the thickness)

name: Sawn
tooltip:
Applies no offset to the preferred dimension, applies an offset to both non-preferred dimensions.

The axis represents the preferred dimension, which will be set to the smallest of the three dimensions. The axis can be changed later.

The preferred dimension will receive a postfix to indicate the dimension that won't be processed. The postfix can be used on multiple dimensions.

Most useful on milling parts, where one surface will not be processed and where this surface has no requirements. This surface will remain in the delivered condition.

name: Pre-Milled
tooltip:
Applies no offset to the preferred dimension, applies an offset to both non-preferred dimensions.

The axis represents the preferred dimension, which will be set to the smallest of the three dimensions. The axis can be changed later.

The preferred dimension will receive a postfix to indicate the dimension that won't be processed.

Most useful on milling parts, where the preferred dimension will be pre-milled. This surface will remain in the delivered condition.

name: Shaft
tooltip:
Applies no offset to any dimension.

The axis represents the turning axis of the part and thus the length of the shaft. The axis will be auto-detected. If no axis can be detected, the longest dimension will be set as the axis. The axis can be changed later.

Most useful on turned parts.

name: Custom
tooltip:
Applies no offset, just retrieves the exact measurements of the parts boundaries.

The result value can be chosen freely, any text or number is valid.
